languages.text: "Предупреждаю: еще раз подобное повторится — и вы с Ксавьером пожалеете".
"I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."
languages.original_text: "Предупреждаю: еще раз подобное повторится — и вы с Ксавьером пожалеете".

traits.locale_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."
"I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."
"I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."
"I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

languages.text: «Se lo advierto: si vuelve a pasar algo semejante, Calcazar y usted lo lamentarán».
languages.original_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

traits.locale_text: «Se lo advierto: si vuelve a pasar algo semejante, Calcazar y usted lo lamentarán».

languages.text: 「これは警告だ。また同じようなことがあったら、君とカルカサルに対して相応の対応をさせてもらう」
languages.original_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

traits.locale_text: 「これは警告だ。また同じようなことがあったら、君とカルカサルに対して相応の対応をさせてもらう」

languages.text: “我警告你，如果再发生这种事情，我会让你和卡尔卡扎都后悔。”
languages.original_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

traits.locale_text: “我警告你，如果再发生这种事情，我会让你和卡尔卡扎都后悔。”

languages.text: « Je vous préviens : si cela venait à se reproduire, Calcazar et vous le regretteriez amèrement. »
languages.original_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous préviens : si cela venait à se reproduire, Calcazar et vous le regretteriez amèrement. »

languages.text: "Ich warne Euch: Sollte es je dazu kommen, werdet Ihr und Calcazar das beide bereuen."
languages.original_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich warne Euch: Sollte es je dazu kommen, werdet Ihr und Calcazar das beide bereuen."

languages.text: "Benden söylemesi... Bir daha öyle bir şey olursa seni de Calcazar'ı da pişman ederim."
languages.original_text: "I am warning you: if such a thing ever happens again, you and Calcazar will both regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Benden söylemesi... Bir daha öyle bir şey olursa seni de Calcazar'ı da pişman ederim."
